fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to roleblock.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After escaping, each night you learn of everyone who visits the house with the Cavalry that night and their role.
- When escaping, you escape at the end of this night rather than tomorrow night.
- RB immune
- Can talk to Redcoats at night, including after escaping.
- Access to "Volleyfire" factional ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Escape with all Redcoats. If a single Redcoat dies, the condition becomes kill everyone who opposes the king.
